desc: A small wristlet made of interlocking chains.
lore:
A small wristlet made of interlocking chains. New links can be easily inserted at any point, or replaced as necessary.

In some cultures, bracelets made of small, linked objects are sometimes used to aid in meditation or mantra. Closer inspection on this particular wristlet reveals that every link has a tiny word scratched into its surface: "Repent."
name: Chain Wristlet
